about_the_game:
They warned us in the 1980S, "YOU DON'T WANT TO KNOW WHAT IS DOWN AT THE BOTTOM OF LAKE TAHOE." The year is 2042. An earthquake beneath the Lake removed rocks from underwater tunnels that set the beast free. the tourist community will become a feeding ground from the creature of the deep. PREPARE TO EVACUATE.

Features:

Dynamic Combat: You are the beast set free from under water caves beneath Lake Tahoe. You seek and destroy anything in your path. Creatures under the lake and humans on land.

TONS of Content: North, East, South, West. All over the map. You will discover surprises and extra points. You will be immersed in a real fantasy tale of unique characters and creatures.

Customization Options Galore: Several different dragon colors to choose from. Many different ways to scare your victims. From swiping, stomping, spitting lava or water, and growl! The options are endless.

Stunning Visuals: Beautiful high-resolution graphics in UE4! 4.27/5.0

content_descriptors.notes: There is blood, destruction, fire, drug references, and screaming.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.50GHz or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.8Ghz or AMD Ryzen 5 3.2Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: They warned us in the 1980S, "You dont want to know what is down at the bottom of lake." The year is 2042. an earthquake below the lake removed rocks from under water tunnel that set the beast free.
